column4: With Amarok2 in Ubuntu, is there any way to disable Amarok2 from locking out all other sounds? I really hate having to close Amarok2 just to YouTube something quick.
set it to use generic alsa
or pulse, if you use that mess
- where, though? In Amarok1 I knew where that setting was. In Amarok2 it feels like they stripped out 80% of the configurable settings.
